title: Andrew Sheets: Is There a Downside to Cutting Interest Rates?
description: On today’s podcast, Chief Cross-Asset Strategist Andrew Sheets asks the timely question, “If lower interest rates stimulate growth, why wouldn’t central banks lower them?”
itunes:title: Andrew Sheets: Is There a Downside to Cutting Interest Rates?
